title: OT108: Opangolin Thread
summary:
Key ideas:
- This is a bi-weekly open thread where people can post about anything they want.
- There are visible and hidden open threads.
- There are comments of the week selected.
- Meetup times and places have been updated.
- Reports from past meetups are invited.
 
Key learnings:
- This blog post serves as an open thread.
- Meetup times and places are subject to change.
- The author is interested in gathering data on meetup attendance.
 
Key questions:
- How many people attended the meetups?
- What did people discuss at the meetups?
- Will there be upcoming meetups in other cities?
